channel.title: Adding pvp
channel.description: I started a new delta 317 from scratch. I added many things , but pvp is giving me some trouble. Anyone know how to add pvp for delta?

item.title: Adding pvp
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zachs Owner Zachs
item.description:
@Owner_Zachs wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:387550”][quote author=Saletana link=topic=483352.msg3540536#msg3540536 date=1300830013]

[code]
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pvp”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Vazzily
} else {
teleportToX = 3363; //Wilderness, mostly wild (=PK)
teleportToY = 9638; //Wilderness, mostly wild (=PK)
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“Welcome to Pvp”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = " " + playerName + " has just entered the new PVP area. Type ::pvp to get there, too!";

        }[/code]

[/quote]
Fail. Are you honestly that stupid?[/quote]

Your flaming his thread? fucking bum

Read full topic

item.title: Adding pvp
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

There is so much wrong with your post, I’ll walk you through it.

Owner Zachs:

I don’t care about how old you are and the size of your dick.

Lol, you’re stupid, no where in my paragraph did I mention my age or my dick size, although reading back on it I did imply it a bit.

Owner Zachs:

All for all your a idiot Flamer you are mad because you got a small Dick and you kno its true.

Hypocrite, You previously stated that you didn’t care about dick size, besides, I don’t have a small dick, and you can think whatever you want to think.

Owner Zachs:

And your mom beats the shit out of you because your a fat inbred fuck.

Actually my mom does hit me when I do something bad, it teaches me how to be a man and not to make the mistake again. If I wasn’t hit as a child I would probably end up like you: Stupid and Ignorant.
Also, child abuse isn’t something to play around with, it is a serious issue…

Owner Zachs:

So SMD and DONT FLAME BECAUSE YOU HAVE A SMALL DICK

That makes no sense whatsoever, also, I’m not the one flaming, YOU are. Your just mad because I can actually keep my cool in situations like this. You see how I am calm right now and completely disregarding your idiotic statements? You probably feel like an idiot now don’t you? I don’t blame you.

Owner Zachs:

Idiot

This is probably the funniest statement of all; you call me an idiot, yet you can’t even make a command work LOLOLOLOL.
Refer to this before calling me or any member on my SexList an idiot: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,483067.msg3537884.html

[quote=“Owner Zachs, post:6, topic:387550”]From your best friend…
Owner_Zachs[/quote]
I’m certainly not your friend, and I can see your name beside your post.
Owner Zachs fails once again.

You feel kinda stupid now, right?

Anytime you want to stop arguing with me, just admit to your mistake and I’ll admit to mine.

Read full topic
